authors.name: Christiana Bjorkli
authors.affiliation: The Norwegian University of Science and Technology

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"29h3c","text":"Immunohistochemical processing was conducted on tissue from chronically implanted animals, as well as non-implanted transgenic mice for characterization of AD neuropathology.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"83vfa","text":"Heat-induced antigen retrieval on all tissue at   for 2 hours in phosphate buffer  (PB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2iplj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3894F1B0841F11EB8CB3E1712F55BA2F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"78i5c","text":"Wash sections 3 x 10min in PB containing 0.2 % Triton X-100  (PBT+). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7vtba","text":"Block sections using 5 % normal goat serum in PBT+ for 1 hour. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lp1u","text":"Incubate sections with the primary antibodies Iba1 (1:1000; ab15690, Abcam, Cambridge, UK), McSA1 (1:1000; MediMabs, Montreal, Canada; characterization), and Aβ42 (1:1000; IBL America, Minnesota, USA; characterization) in PBT+ for 4 hours at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":242,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cck6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B6067060841F11EB8CB3E1712F55BA2F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ep2r","text":"Heat-induced antigen retrieval on all tissue at   for 2 hours in phosphate buffer  (PB).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DFE037E6841F11EB972B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"daq08","text":"Wash in PB for 2x 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"deleb","text":"Permeabilize with 0.5 % Triton‐X‐100 in Tris‐buffered saline (TBS‐Tx; 50 mm Tris, 150 mm NaCl, pH 8.0) for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5rkg0","text":"Block with 10 % normal goat serum in TBS‐Tx for 30 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f88jo","text":"Incubate with the primary antibody (AT8, 1:1000) in TBS‐Tx overnight at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cojv0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2C4FA890842011EB8CB3E1712F55BA2F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9ngpc","text":"Wash sections for 3 x 10 minutes with PBT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8471c","text":"Incubate sections with Alexa Fluor 546 to visualize Iba1 and McSA1, and Alexa Fluor 488 to visualize Aβ42, for 2 hours at room temperature, protected from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83q0v","text":"Wash sections for 10 minutes with 4 ′, 6-diamidino-2-fenylindol (DAPI; 1:10 000; Sigma-Aldrich, Saint-Louis, MO, USA) and PB, followed by 3 washes for 10 minutes with PB. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2svuv","text":"Wash sections with TBS‐Tx for 3 × 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b4pq0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vbc","text":"Incubate with a biotinylated goat anti‐mouse secondary antibody (1:500; Sigma‐Aldrich, St Louis, MO, USA) in TBS‐Tx for 90 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"hsl3","text":"Wash sections for 3 x 10 minutes with TBS‐Tx. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"51sr4","text":"Incubate with ABC (Vectastain ABC kit, Vector Laboratories, Burlingame, CA, USA) for 90 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"19q5h","text":"Wash with TBS‐Tx for 3 x 10 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ibm","text":"Wash with Tris‐HCl for 2 × 5 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"btj5l","text":"Incubate tissue with 0.67 % diaminobenzidine (DAB) and 0.024 % H2O2 for 10 minutes before a final wash with Tris‐HCl (2 × 5 minutes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3cba3","text":"Mount tissue on cut edge frosted glass slides (VWR International, Radnor, PA, USA) with Tris-HCl and leave to dry  for at least 4 hours on a   heating plate, protected from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":141,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2f449","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"18645D70842111EB8CB3E1712F55BA2F","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"38","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ir6t","text":"Place mounted tissue in Xylene (VWR International, Radnor, PA, USA) for at least 5 minutes for defatting and to remove excess water from the tissue, and then coverslip with Entellan (VWR International, Radnor, PA, USA) containing Xylene.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"aelb9","text":"Leave the mounted tissue to dry overnight, protected from light.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: IHC AD neuropathology protocol
